item.title: Twitter Big Data Analytics
item.description:
Summary

Using Apache Spark and Map-reduce in data framework dealing with large text data for classificaition needs. Multi-class classification on twitter users of tweets attitude towards racisim or hate speech.

Keywords Apache PySpark, Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, HashMap

item.title: Dynamic Abbreviation of MMPI-I Chinese Version Based on the Machine Learning Predictions
item.description:
Summary

With the rapid development of society, the stress and pressure of human beings have leaped and are now considered a matter of continuing concern. Thus, personalities and mental status assessments are gradually assimilated into various aspects of our daily life including professional achievements, job searches, and most importantly, healthcare. In the meantime, the applications of machine learning algorithms on psychological topics, such as bipolar disorder diagnosis, schizophrenia diagnosis, autism diagnosis etc., have become a significant field of research.

Keywords MMPI-I Chinese Version, Machine Learning, Abbreviated Scale, Psychological Examination
